#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define fir first
#define sec second
#define ll long long
#define INF 100000000
using namespace std;
int k,l,x,y;
string s,t;
int dp[200][200];
int rec(int i,int j){
	if(i>=k and j>=l){
		return 0;
	}
	if(i>=k)
		return min(y,x+l-j);
	if(j>=l)
		return x+(k-i);
	if(dp[i][j]!=-1)
		return dp[i][j];
	dp[i][j]=INF;
	if(s[i]==t[j])
		dp[i][j]=rec(i+1,j+1);
	else{
		dp[i][j]=1+rec(i+1,j+1);
	}
	for(int a=j+1;a<l;a++)
		dp[i][j]=min(dp[i][j],min(y,x+a-j)+rec(i,a));
	for(int a=i+1;a<k;a++){
		if(t[j]==s[a])
			dp[i][j]=min(dp[i][j],x+a-i+rec(a+1,j+1));
	}
	return dp[i][j];

}

int main(){
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	int cnt=0;
	while(n--){
		cnt++;
		memset(dp,-1,sizeof dp);
		cin>>k>>l>>s>>t>>x>>y;
		cout<<"Case "<<cnt<<": "<<rec(0,0)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
